FuncDef:
The multicast egress statistics enable command enables a device to collect statistics about downstream Layer 3 IPv4 multicast packets based on a slot.
The undo multicast egress statistics enable command disables a device from collecting statistics about downstream Layer 3 IPv4 multicast packets based on a slot.
By default, a device is disabled from collecting statistics about downstream Layer 3 IPv4 multicast packets based on a slot.
CLIs: undo multicast egress statistics enable slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID. The value range varies with the hardware of the router.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable a device to collect statistics about downstream Layer 3 IPv4 multicast packets based on a slot, run the multicast egress statistics enable command. After the function is enabled, you can run the display multicast egress statistics vpn-instance source-address group-address slot or display multicast egress statistics slot command to check statistics about downstream Layer 3 IPv4 multicast packets. The multicast egress statistics enable command takes precedence over the multicast egress statistics vpn-instance source-address group-address slot command. That is, if the multicast egress statistics enable command has been run on a device, the device is enabled to collect statistics about downstream Layer 3 IPv4 multicast packets regardless of whether the multicast egress statistics vpn-instance source-address group-address slot command is run.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the display multicast egress statistics vpn-instance source-address group-address slot or display multicast egress statistics slot command to check statistics about downstream Layer 3 IPv4 multicast packets.
Precautions
The multicast egress statistics enable command is not supported on the following boards: LPUF-50/LPUF-50-L/LPUI-21-L/LPUI-51-L/LPUF-51/LPUF-51-B/LPUI-51/LPUI-51-B/LPUS-51/LPUF-101/LPUF-101-B/LPUI-101/LPUI-101-B/LPUS-101,LPUF-51-E/LPUI-51-E/LPUI-51-S/LPUI-51-CM/LPUF-120/LPUF-120-B/LPUF-120-E/LPUI-102-E/LPUI-120/LPUI-120-B/LPUI-120-L/LPUI-52-E/LPUI-120-E/LPUI-120-CM/LPUF-240/LPUF-240-B/LPUF-240-E/LPUI-240/LPUI-240-B/LPUI-240-CM/LPUI-240-L/LPUF-480/LPUF-480-B/LPUI-480/LPUI-480-B/LPUI-480-L/LPUF-480-E/LPUI-480-CM/LPUF-400-E.
